mapper.insert: INSERT INTO patient (name, resident_no, phone, address, consent_insurance) VALUES (#{name}, #{residentNo}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{consentInsurance})
INSERT INTO patient_account (patient_id, user_id, password) VALUES (#{patientId}, #{userId}, #{password})
mapper.select: SELECT r.record_id, r.created_at, r.diagnosis, d.doctor_name AS doctorName, dept.dept_name AS deptName FROM medical_record r LEFT JOIN doctor d ON r.doctor_id = d.doctor_id LEFT JOIN department dept ON d.dept_id = dept.dept_id WHERE r.patient_id = #{patientId} ORDER BY r.created_at DESC

SELECT p.prescription_id AS prescriptionId, p.record_id AS recordId, p.type AS type, p.created_at AS createdAt, p.drug_name AS drugName, p.dosage AS dosage, p.duration AS duration, p.test_name AS testName, p.test_area AS testArea, p.test_date AS testDate, p.injection_name AS injectionName, p.injection_area AS injectionArea, p.injection_count AS injectionCount, p.unit AS unit, p.unit_price AS unitPrice, d.doctor_name AS doctorName, r.diagnosis AS diagnosis FROM prescription p JOIN medical_record r ON p.record_id = r.record_id LEFT JOIN doctor d ON r.doctor_id = d.doctor_id WHERE r.patient_id = #{patientId} ORDER BY p.created_at DESC

SELECT p.patient_id AS patientId, p.name AS name, p.phone AS phone, p.address AS address, p.admission_status AS admissionStatus, r.room_no AS roomNo, r.ward_name AS wardName, r.nurse_in_charge AS nurseName, r.status AS roomStatus, mr.record_id AS recordId, mr.diagnosis AS diagnosis, mr.doctor_id AS doctorId, d.doctor_name AS doctorName, p.admission_date AS admissionDate, p.discharge_date AS dischargeDate FROM patient p LEFT JOIN room r ON p.room_id = r.room_id LEFT JOIN medical_record mr ON p.patient_id = mr.patient_id LEFT JOIN doctor d ON mr.doctor_id = d.doctor_id WHERE p.admission_status = 'INPATIENT' ORDER BY r.room_no ASC

SELECT p.prescription_id, p.type, p.drug_name, p.dosage, p.duration, p.test_name, p.test_area, p.injection_name, p.injection_count, p.unit, p.created_at FROM prescription p LEFT JOIN medical_record mr ON p.record_id = mr.record_id WHERE mr.patient_id = #{patientId} ORDER BY p.created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE patient SET admission_status = #{admissionStatus} WHERE patient_id = #{patientId}
